current-owned-organizations_one: Your account is currently an owner in this organization: <1>{{organizations}}</1>.
current-owned-organizations_other: Your account is currently an owner in these organizations: <1>{{organizations}}</1>.
delete-warning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
dialog-description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
email-description: You can't change your email address. If you need to change it, please contact support.
still-an-owner: You are still an owner of at least one organization and cannot delete your account.
title: Account
unlock-deletion-description_one: You must remove yourself, transfer ownership, or delete this organization before you can delete your user.
unlock-deletion-description_other: You must remove yourself, transfer ownership, or delete these organizations before you can delete your user.
